means: 阿里斯塔克斯（希腊语法学家和鉴赏家，闻名于其校订和研究<伊利亚特> 和 <奥德赛> ）

sentence.Network_en: As do Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke, my fellow workers.
sentence.Network_cn: 24我的同工马可 、 亚里达古 、 底马 、 路加, 也都问你安.

sentence.Network_en: Then he mentions three Jewish friends Aristarchus, Mark and Justus.
sentence.Network_cn: 接著,他提到三位犹太人的朋友:亚里达古 、 马可和犹士都.

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient Greek grammarian remembered for his commentary on the Iliad and Odyssey (circa 217-145 BC)
2. a bright crater on the moon

auth_sentence.content: Aristarchus is another fairly "young" crater, only 450 million years old and, like Tycho, is the origin of a complex ray system.
